column2:
"As Gettemhart, the Guardian and the others move
through Verun, they defeat each Devil Castle
along the way."

"The Devil Castles were originally a skill from Cuent.
However, many identical Devil Castles were found
scattered across Verun."

"The Devil Castles were spread deeper than originally thought.
The Guardian had raised a question in relation to their history."
"Despite being from Cuent, there sure a lot of Devil Castles here in Verun."
"When they were brought over, they were spread throughout the nation, under the authority of the Emperor."
"Hmm. Then the Emperor of Verun must be well-versed with the knowledge of Magic."
"Of course, he became the Emperor through the power of Demonization. Although, while he can perform Magic..."
"It was not he, who summoned the Devil Castles... That, was Elmir."
"Elmir? Who's that?"
"That damned Emperor's brother. He's always in close proximity of the Emperor, always with a self-absorbed smug look on his face."
"But with the age gap between them, they might as well be father and son with their looks."
"The Emperor and Elmir... There's no mistake about it, they're definitely behind Verun's demise."
"Behind its demise? Well, excuse me. All we did was rally the citizens of this simpleminded nation."
"Elmir!? Why are you here...!?"
"I've heard that someone here destroyed my beloved Devil Castles. So I decided to, investigate."
"So, I came to see you. The Savior of Cuent, the Guardian."
"I see, I see... I feel, unlimited potential. It's no wonder why you defeated a Devil Castle."
"From Devil Castles to Guardians; Cuent sure knows fine craftsmanship."
"You must have some nerve, brazenly waltzing in here, the Emperor's kid brother...!"
"Really, such a tiresome chap you are. I am not interested in your rabble, failed experiment. So would you kindly stop standing in the way?"
"Even if you deny it, we have business to deal with you!"
"What!?"
"If you wish to fight so much, then punch away like the failed Demon Soldiers you are."
"No, it can't be... These people are... I thought they were all... dead?"
"As expected, they're from the same identical experiment. After all, they're a Devil Castle and Demonic Soldier hybrid."
"You replaced the Demons summoned by the Devil Castle with these... soldiers!?"
"Exactly. The components we needed just happened to be scattered around."
"While they all had very questionable abilities, but as soldiers, they're not bad."
"With that being said, it would be a waste if we did not use them effectively. That would be so sad, wouldn't it?"
"How repulsive...!"
"Ha, haha, Haahaahaa!!"
"STOP SCREWING WITH ME! YOU DAMNED FREAK! TOYING WITH US ENDLESSLY, NONSTOP!"
"I'LL KILL YOU...! AND THAT DAMNED EMPEROR BROTHER OF YOURS!"
"Oh yes, what a fine spirit... Then you should come over by stepping on the corpses of your friends."
"Huhu, Hahaha, haahaahaa!"
